sense.def: my elder master, our master, the master, our elder masters etc.

seg.line: 使天下之人皆理會得這道理，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 使天下之人皆理會得這道理，

sense.def: cause N to V, bring it about that N V-s 使之聞之 [NB: the first 之shows that the object of 使 does function as an object and not only as a subject of wén 聞. Thus technically speaking we do not have a sentence after the vt.]

tls:text.tls:line: Moreover, if the sages and worthies had never been born,

form.pron: tiān dì zì rán zhī zhī

sense.def: general natural pattern obtaining in this world

form.pron: tiān dì zì rán zhī zhī

sense.def: general natural pattern obtaining in this world
be self-willed; act in a self-willed irresponsible way; be untrammelled, be overindulgent
【趙岐 on MENG 2B8 ？進退自由 待考】不自由 "unfreiwillig handeln"; act on one's own initiative; be one's own master; act on your own accord; be autonomous; be independent from others, not rely on others
reflect upon one's own person; try to assess one's own person; German: in sich gehen
